name: Fire, Water, Ice 3D
description:
This is a remake of my game, Fire, Water, Ice with 3D models. It works just like Rock, Paper, Scissors. You select from the menu and watch a random scene, an easy point and click game! Do this as many times as you want!

Credits:

Art, Design & Programming: Jeffrey McFarland

Music: Created by Ecrett Music

Sound: All sounds downloaded from freesound.org, "Splash, Jumping, H.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
